name: Lightworks Video Index File
summary: Learn about .LVIX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: After a video is imported into Lightworks, the LVIX file is created. It will be located in the Lightworks "Material" folder with the same name as the imported video but with the LVIX extension appended on to the end. If the imported video is named V00P00J.mp4, the new file would be V00P00J.mp4.lvix.
NOTE: .VIX files are the same as LVIX files but are used for .MTS media files.

description: File created by Lightworks, a program that enables you to edit video; contains video and audio metadata about .MP4 and .MOV media files used by Lightworks; referenced by Lightworks to refine the editing workflow; similar to the .MXF file.
